ygData.subject: Re: Hrmm
ygData.msgSnippet: ... I heard that on the Isle of Sisterhood, there s a secret button you push and you can hear grating stone once pushed. No one knows exactly what it does.
ygData.messageBody:
>From: "Nick Bock" <nickbock@...>
>Hey guys,
>
>If the clue was to look below waves, and before it was stated that a
>Barbarian Shaman would do the exploring, what about the lake outside of
>Halas? Has that already been brought up? If need be, I can take my
>Magician up there and poke around?
>
>Xalastile
>lvl 22 magician
>xegony

I heard that on the Isle of Sisterhood, there's a secret button you push and
you can hear grating stone once pushed. No one knows exactly what it does.
Somewhere (EQ stratics perhaps?) I read an interview with Brad McQuaid. In
this interview, Brad hinted at the button opening a secret passage to a
dungeon that located under the water near the island. This dungeon was
supposed to have very good loot, but is also supposed to be guarded well. I
don't know firsthand if this is true or not, (one can never tell with Verant
anyhow) because I've never personally been there to check it out. So it all
very well may be just rumor. But if it isn't, it may be a very good lead.
